connected.name: Is connected
connected.description: Checks if the graph is connected.

strongly_connected.name: Is strongly connected
strongly_connected.description: Checks if the graph is strongly connected.

transition_degree_one.name: Transition Degree 1
transition_degree_one.description: Checks if every transition has in/out degree 1.

node_on_shortest_path.name: Node on shortest path
node_on_shortest_path.description: Check if a node is on the shortest path from one node to another node.

node_label_exists.name: Node label exists
node_label_exists.description: Checks if a node with a particular label exists.

arc_missing.name: Arc missing
arc_missing.description: Checks if an arc is missing between two nodes.

arc_has_label.name: Arc has given label
arc_has_label.description: Checks if an arc has a given label

at_most_one_arc.name: At most one arc between nodes
at_most_one_arc.description: Check if there is at most one arc from one node to another node.
